notesStmt.note: First treatise is an account compiled by Count Lorenzo Magalotti of the travels of Johann Grueber and Albert d'Orville. It was translated into French by Melchisédech Thévenot, that translation subsequently being rendered into English. Cf. BM.
Second treatise has special t.p. dated 1675.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
